Task: Turn off the living room light_224_8
Description: Turn off the floor lamp in the living room.
Find the vase in the room, pick it up and throw it at the window
Go near to the closed blinds. Then open the blinds
If the bed is dirty, clean it.
Find the basketball and put it into the drawer
Grab the tennis racket. Hit the mirror with it until it breaks.

Task: Turn off all the bedroom light_302_8
Description: First locate the the bedroom light switches.Then turn off all the lights
Go to the bed. Take off the pillow and teddy bear.
Go to the window. Shut the blinds.
Find the candle in the room. Blow out the flame.
Locate handtowel. Remove from handtowelholder. Turn bathroomfaucet on. Put handtowel under stream of water to wet it.
GO TO THE BATHROOM OPEN THE SINK TAP. THE WATER WILL BE FILLED
TAKE A CLOTH .GO AND STAND NEAR THE MIRROR CLEAN THE MIRROR WITH THE CLOTH

Task: Throw away used toilet roll and soap bottle_411_8
Description: take the used toilet roll or the used soap bottle if it is empty and throw it into the bin
take the hand towel and fold it then hang it on the towel holder
turn the bathroom faucet anti-clockwise until water starts running out the shower head
take the soap bottle or spray bottle and throw it hard on the shower glass until it breaks

Locate cell phone. Walk to cell phone. Pick up cell phone. Locate credit card. Walk to credit card. Pick up credit card. Locate laptop. Walk to laptop. Pick up laptop. Locate teddy bear. Walk to teddy bear. Pick up teddy. Bear. Locate safe. Walk to safe. Unlock safe. Open safe. Place cell phone, credit card, laptop, and teddy bear in safe. Close safe. Lock safe.
Get the watering can, walk to the house plant, pour some water on it.
Firstly, find the kettle. Fill the kettle with water from the Faucet. Place the kettle on the stove. Turn on the stove using the StoveKnob. Wait for the water to boil in the kettle.

Task: Fill up the bathtub with water_402_8
Description: Turn on the bath tub faucet and wait till the bath tub basin is completely filled with water. Then turn off the bath tub faucet.
Move to shower curtain. Pull shower curtain closed.

Make coffee with the coffee machine. Turn on the gas burner. Locate the egg and pan. Crack the egg into the pan and dispose of the shell in the sink basin. Place the pan on the gas burner. Locate the bread. Place the bread in the toaster and turn on the toaster.

Task: Find the egg in the room_1_8
Description: Find the egg in the room
Put all the utensils in the sink basin. Take soap from the soap bottle and wash all the utensils with the dish sponge.

Task: Turn on all the floor lamp_201_8
Description: find the floor lamp in the room and turn the switch on.
Take all the dirty clothes and soak them in soap water for some time
